SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GETTITLEGUID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets the guid of the title
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_GETTITLEGUID(@TITLE nvarchar(100)) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin DECLARE @RESULT uniqueidentifier
SELECT @RESULT = tc.ID FROM dbo.TITLECODE tc WHERE tc.DESCRIPTION = @TITLE
return @RESULT end
